mapper.select: select id, authority_id, password, name, tel, address, com_name, cr_no, entry from tb_member where authority_id = 20
mapper.insert: insert into tb_member(id, authority_id, password, birth, name, tel, address, activation) values (#{id}, 30, #{password}, #{birth}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{address}, 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_member SET name=#{name}, password=#{password}, tel=#{tel}, address=#{address}, com_name=#{com_name} where id=#{id}
